original_text: For whoever keeps the whole law and yet stumbles at just one point is guilty of breaking all of it.
korean_text: 누구든지 온 율법을 지키다가 그 하나를 범하면 모두 범한 자가 되나니

sentences.original_text: For whoever keeps the whole law
and yet stumbles at just one point
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 한 가지 점에서 걸려 넘어지면

sentences.original_text: is guilty of breaking all of it
